citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A male Shihtzu, mc#7E10085849, has a heavily matted haircoat. There is one solid matt from the top of his head to the
base of his tail. There is also matting on his abdomen, legs and feet. Matting of the haircoat could be painful and hold
onto dirt and debris which could lead to skin issues.
A male Maltese puppy, dob 11/24/22, has fecal material adhered to matted hair around the anal region. The fecal material
and the matted hair must be removed.
The licensee must remove the matted hair from these dogs and ensure that all animals remain free of matted hair at all
times.
To be corrected by: 7 July 23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:

A male Maltese puppy, dob 11/24/22, has fecal material adhered to matted hair around the anal region. The fecal material

 The licensee must remove the matted hair from these dogs and ensure that all animals remain free of matted hair at all
